sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Máfan nǐ bāng wǒ yī gè máng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pourrais-tu me rendre un service ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Could you do me a favor?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège dìfang zhēn měilì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet endroit est vraiment beau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This place is really beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shuāng xié yǐjīng pò le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces chaussures sont déjà usées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These shoes are already worn out.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ qiānwàn bié wàng le dài hùzhào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: N'oublie surtout pas d'apporter ton passeport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Whatever you do, don't forget to bring your passport.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yī qún háizi zài gōngyuán lǐ wán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Un groupe d'enfants joue dans le parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A group of children are playing in the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào guò nà zuò qiáo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons traverser ce pont.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to cross that bridge.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè liǎng gè cí yǒu shénme qūbié?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est la différence entre ces deux mots ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is the difference between these two words?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ shuō de quèshí yǒu dàolǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce que tu dis est vraiment sensé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What you said is indeed reasonable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiàngmù quēshǎo zījīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce projet manque de fonds.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This project lacks funding.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你有任何问题都可以问我。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yǒu rènhé wèntí dōu kěyǐ wèn wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu peux me poser n'importe quelle question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You can ask me any question.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zuò zài shāfā shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez vous asseoir sur le canapé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sit on the sofa.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们完成了今天的任务。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen wánchéng le jīntiān de rènwu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons accompli la tâche d'aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We completed today's task.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 听到这个消息，她很伤心。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi, tā hěn shāngxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En apprenant cette nouvelle, elle était très triste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She was very sad to hear this news.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo hé hěn shēn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette rivière est très profonde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This river is very deep.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们生活在二十一世纪。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen shēnghuó zài èrshíyī shìjì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous vivons au vingt et unième siècle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We live in the twenty-first century.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu hěn shìhé nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce vêtement te va très bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This piece of clothing suits you very well.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他已经适应了这里的生活。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǐjīng shìyìng le zhèlǐ de shēnghuó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'est déjà adapté à la vie ici.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has already adapted to life here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn dàfang, jīngcháng qǐngkè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est très généreuse, elle invite souvent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is very generous and often treats others.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Běijīng shì Zhōngguó de shǒudū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pékin est la capitale de la Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beijing is the capital of China.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 首先，让我介绍一下自己。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shǒuxiān, ràng wǒ jièshào yīxià zìjǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: D'abord, laissez-moi me présenter.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: First, let me introduce myself.
